title: Kris Sowersby
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416184258/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416184258/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Kris Sowersby**

Kris Sowersby is an independent type designer, typographer and graphic designer. Based in Wellington, the capital of New Zealand, he runs the [Klim](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416184258/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Klim) Type Foundry. Three of his typefaces have been awarded [TDC](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416184258/http:/typophile.com/wiki/TDC)2 awards. National in 2007, Hardys and Serrano in 2008.

Kris has designed or collaborated on the following typefaces:

**Retail**

  
- [Feijoa](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416184258/http:/www.klim.co.nz/feijoa_samples.php "KLIM / Retail / Feijoa Samples") (2007, a serif family for text, [Village](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416184258/http:/vllg.com/KLIM/Feijoa/mudTyper+Weights/ "village /// vllg.com")).  
- [National](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416184258/http:/www.klim.co.nz/national_samples.php "KLIM / Retail / National Samples") (2007–2009 a sans serif family, [Village](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416184258/http:/vllg.com/KLIM/National/mudTyper+Weights/ "village /// vllg.com")).  
- [FF Meta Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416184258/http:/www.klim.co.nz/meta_serif.php "KLIM / Retail / Meta Serif") (2007, Serif counterpart to FF Meta, designed with [Christian Schwartz](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416184258/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Christian%20Schwartz) and [Erik Spiekermann](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416184258/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Erik%20Spiekermann), [microsite](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416184258/http:/metaserif.com/)).  
- [Newzald](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416184258/http:/www.klim.co.nz/newzald_samples.php "KLIM / Retail / Newzald") (2008, a serif family for text, [Village](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416184258/http:/vllg.com/KLIM/Newzald/mudTyper+Weights/ "village /// vllg.com") ).  
- [Galaxie Copernicus](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416184258/http:/www.klim.co.nz/galcop_samples.php "KLIM / Retail / Galaxie Copernicus") (2009, a reconsideration of [Plantin](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416184258/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Plantin), designed with [Chester Jenkins](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416184258/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Chester%20Jenkins), [Village](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416184258/http:/vllg.com/Village/GalaxieCopernicus/mudTyper+Weights/ "village /// vllg.com") ).

**Custom**

  
- [Eliza](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416184258/http:/www.klim.co.nz/custom_eliza.php "KLIM / Custom / Eliza") (2003).  
- [Rewards](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416184258/http:/www.klim.co.nz/custom_rewards.php "KLIM / Custom / Rewards") (2006).  
- [NZ Rugby Chisel](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416184258/http:/www.klim.co.nz/custom_chisel.php "KLIM / Custom / NZ Rugby Chisel") (2006, The All Blacks Typeface).  
- [Hokotohu](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416184258/http:/www.klim.co.nz/custom_hoko.php "KLIM / Custom / Hokotohu") (2007, A typeface for the Moriori).  
- [Victoria Sans and Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416184258/http:/www.klim.co.nz/custom_vic.php "KLIM / Custom / Victoria Sans & Serif") (2007, Custom typefaces for Victoria University).  
- [Hardys](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416184258/http:/www.klim.co.nz/custom_hardys.php "KLIM / Custom / Hardys") (2008, a typeface for Constellation Wines Australia).  
- [Methven Flow](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416184258/http:/www.klim.co.nz/custom_methvenflow.php "KLIM / Custom / Methven Flow") (2008, a typeface for Methven).  
- [Serrano](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416184258/http:/www.klim.co.nz/custom_serrano.php "KLIM / Custom / Serrano") (2008, a typeface for The Bank of New Zealand).
author: kris
